mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.uid AS "uid", a.opt_time AS "optTime", a.type AS "type", a.url AS "url", a.date_int AS "dateInt", a.share_result AS "shareResult", a.come_from AS "comeFrom", a.campaign AS "campaign", a.module AS "module", a.remark AS "remark", a.openid AS "openid"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend_share_log( id, uid, opt_time, type, url, date_int, share_result, come_from, campaign, module, remark, openid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{uid}, #{optTime}, #{type}, #{url}, #{dateInt}, #{shareResult}, #{comeFrom}, #{campaign}, #{module}, #{remark}, #{openid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE friend_share_log SET uid = #{uid}, opt_time = #{optTime}, type = #{type}, url = #{url}, date_int = #{dateInt}, share_result = #{shareResult}, come_from = #{comeFrom}, campaign = #{campaign}, module = #{module}, remark = #{remark}, openid = #{openid} WHERE id = #{id}
